scripts.clean:shadow:win: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path src -Recurse -Filter *.js | ForEach-Object { $ts=$_.FullName -replace '\.js$', '.tsx'; $jsx=$_.FullName -replace '\.js$', '.jsx'; if (Test-Path $ts -or Test-Path $jsx) { Remove-Item -LiteralPath $_.FullName -Force } }; Get-ChildItem -Path src -Recurse -Filter *.js.map | ForEach-Object { $tsx=$_.FullName -replace '\.js\.map$', '.tsx'; $jsx=$_.FullName -replace '\.js\.map$', '.jsx'; if (Test-Path $tsx -or Test-Path $jsx) { Remove-Item -LiteralPath $_.FullName -Force } }"
scripts.clean:shadow:nix: bash -lc "shopt -s globstar; for f in src/**/*.js; do base=${f%.js}; if [[ -e ${base}.tsx || -e ${base}.jsx ]]; then rm -f \"$f\"; fi; done; for m in src/**/*.js.map; do base=${m%.js.map}; if [[ -e ${base}.tsx || -e ${base}.jsx ]]; then rm -f \"$m\"; fi; done"
